Uses of Package
io.github.goodees.ese.core

  • Packages that use io.github.goodees.ese.core 
    Package Description
    io.github.goodees.ese.core
    Small event sourcing library.
    io.github.goodees.ese.core.async  
    io.github.goodees.ese.core.dispatch
    Request dispatcher guaranteeing single request being processed by entity at any given time.
    io.github.goodees.ese.core.matching
    Utilities for type-based branch switching.
    io.github.goodees.ese.core.store
    Base classes and APIs for implementing event and snapshot storage.
    io.github.goodees.ese.core.sync  
    io.github.goodees.ese.immutables
    Support for events based on Immutables and their JSON serialization.
    io.github.goodees.ese.store.inmemory
    In-memory storage, for tests and protypes.
    io.github.goodees.ese.store.jdbc
    JDBC-Backed storage.
  • Classes in io.github.goodees.ese.core used by io.github.goodees.ese.core 
    Class and Description
    EntityInvocationHandler
    Common logic for facade to speaking with entities.
    EntityInvocationHandler.CompletionHandler
    Interface describing completion handler
    EntityInvocationHandler.Configuration
    Roll all configuration aspect into single interface.
    EntityInvocationHandler.Lifecycle
    Configuration aspect describing lifecycle of entity instances.
    EntityInvocationHandler.Persistence
    Configuration aspect describing reading and writing to persistent storage.
    EntityInvocationHandler.ThrowingInvocation
    Helper interface describing a function that may throw a checked exception.
    EntityInvocationHandler.WorkingMemory
    Configuration aspect describing in-memory storage of entities.
    Event
    Immutable fact about business domain relevant fact that became true.
    EventSourcedEntity
    A single event sourced entity.
    EventSourcedEntity.EntityInvocationState
    The state entity is in.
    EventSourcedEntity.InvocationState 
    Request
    Marker interface identifying a request and the type expected as response to it.
